Articles.Content: Just a simple idea I had, I know it's really *really* easy to just hit space bar to launch, but a big red button to launch would be cool.

I always thought an animated one should pop out like the Abort button does, but on the right side of that upper UI thing instead.

Maybe that would be easy to do?
There's just one problem... There's already a big red button
